net.javacoding.jspider.api.model
Interface Site

All Known Implementing Classes:
SiteInternal
public interface Site

$Id: Site.java,v 1.21 2003/03/28 17:26:27 vanrogu Exp $

Author:
Günther Van Roey

Field Summary
static int STATE_DISCOVERED
          if the site is newly discovered, we're not going to fetch resources until we have interpreted the site's robots.txt rules.
static int STATE_ROBOTSTXT_ERROR
          if robots.txt couldn't be fetched (but seems to be there), no resources will be fetched from the site!
static int STATE_ROBOTSTXT_HANDLED
          if the robots.txt was handled (interpreted or missing), we can fetch resources from it.
static int STATE_ROBOTSTXT_SKIPPED
          if robots.txt was skipped, all resources can be fetched !
static int STATE_ROBOTSTXT_UNEXISTING
          if robots.txt was not found, all resources can be fetched !

 java.lang.String getCookieString()

 boolean getUseCookies()
           
 boolean getUseProxy()
           
 boolean isRobotsTXTHandled()
